review:
Exceptional Experience at Promed Hospital - Heartfelt Recommendation for Dr. Arun Kalyanasundaram

I am writing to share an experience that has left me truly speechless and has given our family renewed faith in the medical profession. My family and I recently had the privilege of being treated at Promed Hospital, and I wholeheartedly recommend this hospital to anyone facing heart ailments.

In particular, I insist that any patient with a heart ailment should seek the expertise of Dr. Arun Kalyanasundaram. He is undoubtedly a subject matter expert and possesses an unparalleled depth of knowledge in his field. Not only does he have an excellent grasp of his subject matter, but he also ensures that his patients are thoroughly educated about their entire medical journey. Dr. Arun takes the time to consult with patients, actively seeking their views and ensuring they are comfortable throughout the process.

One of the most remarkable aspects of Dr. Arun is his friendly and approachable demeanor. He has the extraordinary ability to make the daunting medical procedures feel like a walk in the park. During my time at the hospital, I took a closer look at his profile and discovered his unwavering commitment to educating the masses on heart health, which is truly commendable. I also found him on Instagram, where he goes by the handle "Heart of Living," a platform that exemplifies his dedication to spreading awareness and knowledge.

It is worth noting that Dr. Arun's influence extends beyond himself. He has impeccably trained his team to be just as caring and compassionate as he is, providing immense comfort to the patients they attend to. Special commendations go to Doctor Akinchan, Doctor Naseer, and all the instrumental members who contributed to the success of our surgery.

As a family, we cannot express enough gratitude to Dr. Arun Kalyanasundaram and his team. We believe that they are the go-to choice for anyone seeking treatment for heart ailments. Their expertise, compassion, and dedication have made a profound impact on us, and we will forever be grateful for their care.

Lastly, I would like to extend a heartfelt thank you to Dr. T. S. Subramanuim for connecting us with Dr. Arun. Your support and guidance have been invaluable to us.

Rajagopalanâ€™s family

I had gone for PCI to RCA &LCX Angioplasty (CTO) done by Dr.Arun sir at ProMED hospital, Chennai.Dr.Arun sir has creates positive mind in patient. He is friendly doctor and wonderful and kind person who has given excellent care and attention to the patient.Dr.Arun sir is really well experienced and expert in CTO PCI.I have strongly recommending him to traet complex Choronary artery decease.

I consulted Dr Arun Kalyanasundaram, * ****** ******** very friendly and down to earth specialist who gives the patient lot of comfort and his level of confidence and experience in treating complex cardiac diseases is amazing, Angiogram revealed I had Chronic Total Occlusion and he advised me to go for angioplasty. I had 3 blocks, and the procedure was done on 3rd Feb 2021, throughout the procedure the Dr was talking to me and was explaining everything he was doing and gave me so much comfort and it was a painless procedure. I am 52 years I feel so energetic after the procedure I started my workout and every time I meet the Doc, he gives me so much comfort. I like his quote when we were talking to him HEART IS MY PLAYING FIELD ANT THATâ€™S WHERE I PERFORM MY BEST . I highly recommend Dr Kalyan Sundaram as he is one of the best in this field and Promed as the staff there at all levels are very caring, the patients will definitely experience the skill and the care. Stay healthy.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback

review: Not recommended for geriatric and conservative treatment. First consultation for a geriatric patient. ****** *** **** **** ** ************** *** ******** *********** ** *** *** ********** ** ******** ******* ********** ** ********* ******** *** did not listen to what we wanted to share about patient's condition. Charged a bomb for referring us to the General Physician and wanted to take tests for Rs. 11,000 before advise. ****** *** ***** ** ********** ** ***** **** *********** **** **** ******** ** *** *******

We are consulting Dr.Arun sir for my father-in-law who had massive heart attack few months ago wherein he had emergency angioplasty where the survival rate is low since he also has diabetes and kidney failure problem. Doctor was very transparent and  upfront about the whole process and explained it to the family clearly, he was very confident about the surgery and as he said he did it. After some recovery time, my father-in-law is back on his feet and there is significant improvement in his quality of life. We are very grateful we got a doctor like Arun sir in the right timeðŸ˜Š

review: I'm so happy with the treatment. Kudos to Dr. Arun and his team. They've done an excellent job. I recently underwent Angiogram. It revealed extensive three vessel disease with 100% blockage in Right side. My primary Cardiologist suggested Early open heart surgery. Then I came to know about Dr. Arun thru my friends. Dr. Arun Kalyanasundaram reviewed my Angiogram and he has treated all blockages with the treatment of Angioplasty. I got discharged after 3 days. Now I'm able toperform my daily activities without any discomfort. Many Thanks to Dr. Arun and his Team.
reply_text: Thank you for your  valuable feedback

review: I consulted Dr Arunkalyansaundaram Interventional cardiology at Promed Hospital. Dr is so humble in listening and explaining to all my questions. Fee is also very minimal. I definitely recommend others to visit hospital if they have cardiac problem.
